text: annane allahu avare raksappetuttiyappeal avarata n'yayamillate bhumiyil atikramam pravarttikkunnuhe; manusyare, ninnal ceyyunna atikramam ninnalkketiril tanneyayirikkum (bhavikkuka.) ihaleakajivitattile sukhanubhavam matraman (at vali ninnalkk kittunnat‌) . pinne nam'mute atuttekkan ninnalute matakkam. appeal ninnal pravartticcu keantirunnatinepparri ninnale nam vivaramariyikkunnatan‌
